openwebui_variables.name: GEMINI_API_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the URL to Gemini's API.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_GEMINI_API_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the URL to Gemini's image generation API.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_GEMINI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the Gemini API key for image generation.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_GEMINI_ENDPOINT_METHOD
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the Gemini API endpoint method (predict or generateContent).

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_EDIT_ENGINE
openwebui_variables.description: Configures the engine used for image editing operations, enabling modification of existing images using text prompts.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_EDIT_MODEL
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the model to use for image editing operations within the selected engine (e.g., gemini-2.5-flash).

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_EDIT_SIZE
openwebui_variables.description: Defines the output dimensions for edited images in WIDTHxHEIGHT format (e.g., 1024x1024). Leave empty to preserve original dimensions.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_EDIT_GEMINI_API_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Configures the Gemini API base URL for image editing operations with Gemini models.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGES_EDIT_GEMINI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Provides authentication for Gemini image editing API requests.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_GENERATION_ENGINE
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the engine to use for image generation.
